Text: JDF Luncheon TodayMr Lay I thoroughly enjoyed the awards luncheon today and I understand this was your treat to us for having done such a good job Im so proud to have been a part of this and have one more thing to brag on about Enron to family and friends I hope you and your loved ones have a great holiday season Sincerely Regina Karsolich Enron Net Works LLC

Congratulationswonderful news for you Jeff and it sounds as though you will now have two plates full As a Sr Admin may I offer any assistance to you or your Exec Assistant no matter how small to help you in any way I have been in awe of Enron since day one for me and I continue to revel in its successes Im proud to be here and I thank both you and Ken an Joe for building this company on such an exciting foundation My very best wishes for a happy holiday season Sincerely Regina Karsolich Sr Administrative Assistant to Allan Sommer VP ecommerce Enron Net Works LLC
